nodes.info:
# ðŸ“˜ Danfoss Alarm XML Format

Each alarm is represented by an `<alarm>` element with the following structure:

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `alarm`             | â€”                 | Identifies this message as an alarm |

## Alarm Metadata

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `ref`               | int               | Unique alarm reference number (range 1â€“2,147,483,647); resets after alarm log is cleared |
| `storeName`         | string            | Configured name of store (max 16 chars) |
| `unitNumber`        | int               | System Manager unit number (0â€“9, 0 = master) |
| `unitName`          | string            | Name of System Manager unit (max 16 chars) |
| `deviceName`        | string            | Name of device (e.g. AKC55, EKC204A) |
| `deviceModel`       | string            | Model number (e.g. 084B8520) |
| `nodetype`          | int               | Number identifying the device type (see "Node Types") |
| `addr`              | string            | Board and point number in display format (e.g. " 20") |
| `class`             | string            | Alarm class name (used for routing) |
| `class_id`          | int               | ID for alarm class |
| `level_id`          | int               | ID for alarm severity/type (e.g. Hi_Temp) |
| `name`              | string            | Alarm name |
| `name_id`           | int               | ID for generic alarm name (0-based index from EDF) |
| `device_id`         | string            | Composed of `<MODEL>_<VERSION>` from EDF file (e.g. `080Z0124_012x`) |

## Alarm State

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `status`            | string            | "active" or "cleared" |
| `action`            | string            | "Critical", "Normal", "Log only", or "Disabled" |
| `acked_clearable`   | int               | `1` = can be cleared, `0` = not clearable |
| `value`             | string / decimal  | Value when alarm tripped (e.g. "Trip", "OK", or numeric) |
| `current_value`     | string            | Current value (may match `value`) |
| `parval`            | int / decimal     | Raw numeric value (may be `null`) |
| `units`             | string            | Units of the value |
| `units_index`       | int               | Index for the units |
| `setting`           | string            | Alarm description or trigger setting |
| `acknowledgement`   | string            | "Yes" if acknowledged, "No" if not |

## Timestamps

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `occurDate`         | date              | Date when alarm occurred |
| `occurTime`         | time              | Time when alarm occurred |
| `clearDate`         | date              | Date when alarm was cleared |
| `clearTime`         | time              | Time when alarm was cleared |
| `epoch`             | int               | Epoch timestamp when alarm occurred |
| `epoch_cleared`     | int               | Epoch timestamp when alarm was cleared |
| `ackDate`           | string            | Date when alarm was acknowledged |
| `ackTime`           | string            | Time when alarm was acknowledged |
| `epoch_acked`       | int               | Epoch timestamp of acknowledgement |
| `inactiveDate`      | string            | Date when alarm became inactive |
| `inactiveTime`      | string            | Time when alarm became inactive |
| `epoch_inactive`    | int               | Epoch timestamp when alarm became inactive |

## Networking & Identity

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `ipAddr`            | string            | IP address of System Manager (e.g. `192.168.1.51`) |
| `macAddr`           | string            | MAC address of System Manager (e.g. `00-0B-2D-0D-17-7E`) |
| `storeId1`          | string            | Store ID (8 characters, left-justified with spaces if short) |
| `storeId2`          | string            | Secondary store ID (8 characters) |

## Transmission Info

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `xmitNum`           | int               | Retransmission counter (starts at 1) |
| `routingAction`     | int               | Routing action (range: 1â€“15) |

## State Flags

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `active_state`      | int               | `1` = alarm active, `0` = condition returned to normal |
| `acked_state`       | int               | `1` = acknowledged; may be forced depending on firmware |
| `cleared_state`     | int               | `1` = cleared manually; may be forced depending on firmware |

## User Info

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `ackUserAcct`       | string            | User account (e.g. `99-99`) that acknowledged the alarm |
| `clearUserAcct`     | string            | User account that cleared the alarm |

## System View

| Element             | Data Type         | Definition |
|---------------------|-------------------|------------|
| `listed_as`         | int               | Display list: `1` = active, `2` = acknowledged, `3` = cleared |
